overview: Based on over 1000 hours of original material shot by dozens of cameramen at world-wide events, Havoc 8 will surprise, shock and entertain you like no other video because all the incidents actually happened! Rallies, sportscar racing, motorcycle road racing, motocross, single seaters, a caravan Destruction Derby (!), snow-scooters and European Rally Cross Championship are all featured in some not so glorious but often gloriously funny moments. And to cap it all, there's a very special dose of stuntmania running throughout. Even if you've never visited a powersport event you're sure to find Havoc 8 rivetting, funny, shocking and above all compulsive viewing!
title: Havoc #8
